Gavrilović: Četiri uzastopne utakmice ostavile traga na neke igrače
07 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Zile
Trener košarkaša Crvene zvezde, Andrija Gavrilović, čestitao je pobedu Realu i uzroke poraza potražio u skraćenoj rotaciji i velikom broju utakmica u kratkom periodu.
– Čestitam Real Madridu jer su odigrali dobru defanzivnu utakmicu tokom 40 minuta. To je bio naš problem večeras, a poslednja četvrtina je samo rezultat njihovog rada u odbrani, presinga i agresivnosti na skoku, što smo platili u poslednjih pet minuta. Zadovoljan sam zbog reakcije mog tima u trećoj četvrtini jer su se borili i ušli smo u poslednju četvrtinu sa vođstvom. Pokušao sam izmenama i, na žalost, nije nikakvo opravdanje, ali na neke igrače su četiri uzastopne utakmice ostavile traga. Tu pre svega mislim na Perperoglua, Dženkins nije bio agresivan koliko bi trebalo i mislim da se tu iscrpela naša rotacija u poslednjoj četvrtini i, takođe na žalost, vreme tu jako brzo istekne i trojki 7/9 u poslednjoj četvrtini razlika je vrlo brzo otišla, izjavio je Gavrilović.
Usledilo je pitanje da li će biti dodatne selekcije igrača.
– Ne bih preuzimao na sebe odgovornost šta treba da se uradi, razumećete iz kog razloga. Derik Braun čeka još dva specijalistička pregleda pre nego što dobije zeleno svetlo da trenira sa ekipom. On ima povredu kolena koja je posledica ranijih intervencija i stvar je u tome da treba da se vrati u formu i pod nekim određenim obimom rada ima probleme sa kolenom. Filip je juče povredio koleno. Bio je na magnetnoj rezonanci, istegnuo je ukrštene ligamente, trebaće mu nekoliko dana. Davidovac ima bol u leđima i treba da sanira tu upalu, radi terapije i leči se medikamentima. Lazić je dobio udarac u nos, ali je bio spreman da se vrati, ali zbog energije koju je doneo Dobrić i zbog toga što je pokrio to što je trebalo da deli sa Brankom, taj pritisak na loptu i odbranu od pik en rola i plejmejkera ga nisam koristio više, zaključio je trener crveno-belih.

Gavrilovic: Four consecutive games have left a mark on some players
07 Nov 2019, 21:00 by Zile
Red Star basketball coach Andrija Gavrilovic congratulated Real's victory and looked for causes of defeat in short rotation and a large number of games in a short period.
- Congratulations to Real Madrid for playing a good defensive game over 40 minutes. That was our problem tonight, and the last quarter is just the result of their work in defense, pressing and aggression on the jump, which we paid for in the last five minutes. I am pleased with my team’s reaction in the third quarter as they struggled and we entered the final quarter with a lead. I tried the changes and unfortunately it is no excuse, but for some players four consecutive games left a mark. I think, first of all, of Perperoglu, Jenkins wasn't as aggressive as he should have been and I think that exhausted our rotation in the last quarter and, unfortunately, time is running out very fast and the triples 7/9 in the last quarter the difference went very quickly. said Gavrilovic.
The question was whether there would be additional player selections.
- I would not take responsibility for what should be done, you will understand for what reason. Derrick Brown waits for two more specialist examinations before getting the green light to train with the team. He has a knee injury that is the result of earlier interventions and the thing is that he needs to get back in shape and has some knee problems with some of the workload. Philip injured his knee yesterday. He was on magnetic resonance, he was stretching his ligaments, and it would take him several days. The Davidic has back pain and needs to repair this inflammation, for therapy and for medication. Lazic got a blow to his nose but was ready to come back, but because of the energy that Dobric brought and because he covered what he needed to share with Branko, that pressure on the ball and the defense against the pick and roll and the playmaker i didn't use any more, the red and white coach concluded.
